entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Bouctouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kouchibouguac 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

Humidity: 38 %

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
